channel.title: Ruiming on Ruiming's website
channel.description: Recent content in Ruiming on Ruiming's website

item.description: I am a Ph.D. student in Bioengineering at UC Berkeley. I work on computational microscopy advised by Prof. Laura Waller. Before Berkeley, I spent six years at UCLA and obtained B.S. in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics with Cum Laude and M.S. in Computer Science. My past research was on computer vision and medical imaging. In college, I worked on knowledge graph parsing/explainable AI advised by Prof. Song-Chun Zhu. During M.
